summary: DT: THE VEHICLE WAS BEING DRIVEN AT 35 MPH WHEN IT STALLED.  THE VEHICLE EVENTUALLY STOPPED AND LOST STEERING AND BRAKES.  THIS HAS HAPPENED 4 TIMES.   THE VEHICLE USUALLY STALLS AT LOWER SPEEDS ABOUT 35 MPH.   NO WARNING LIGHTS ILLUMINATED BEFORE FAILURE, ONLY AFTER THE INCIDENT OCCURRED.   THE VEHICLE IS REGULARLY SERVICED. NO OTHER PROBLEMS WITH VEHICLE. DUE TO THIS PROBLEM VEHICLE IS NOT DRIVEN. PROBLEM BEGAN ABOUT A YEAR AGO.*AK  *SB
